snippet: The federal government argued that the fraught relationship between the companies ran counter to their defense in the case....
abstract: Justice Dept, which is suing health insurers Anthem and Cigna to stop their $48 billion merger, reveals in court documents that both companies have been accusing each other of breaching their deal.
lead_paragraph: The federal government argued that the fraught relationship between the companies ran counter to their defense in the case.

headline.main: Anthem and Cigna Accuse Each Other of Breaching Merger Deal
headline.print_headline: While Battling U.S., Anthem and Cigna Are Also Sniping at Each Other
